values:
What Emotion Dominates you?

Lonliness dominates you. You can hide it well, but its there, and your friends can see it. You constantly feel alone, and need to do things to fill your time. Your afraid to tell people this, but sooner or later it gets out in a bad way, and you think you screwed up everything. And when you are in love is when you are sad the most. (Please Vote)

Well my weekend was interesting to say the least... Friday I went to the POWERS meeting and did crafty stuffs. Fun but Brandon drove me up the fucking walls...he makes me wonder if kids are a good idea for me GAAAH! Well I called Derek the Lyon earlier on Friday cuz it was his b-day *yayness* or rather by the time he called me he wasn't so good...I offered to leave the meeting to hang out with him...he absolutly refused! Grrr I wanted out of there and well he was depressed. I ended up just talking online for the majority of the night. On Saturday I decided at about 11:30 to get dressed and go down town since my wonderful mother decided to ditch me for the beggining of my b-day. I went to the palace and played pool till about 1am, a co-worker from the U bought me my first shot...kinda was awkward cuz I don't know her that well. oh well! well about 1:05ish I decided it was about time to go to Amvets... I got there and got ID...paid the cover, went to the bar and the bartender asked what I wanted and I said something that was kinda sweet that I couldn't taste the alochol and he gave me a vodka and OJ for my free drink. I saw Kris, Bryce and some other gentleman that I don't know the name of. I sat their for a minute and saw a guy that I had hooked up with a few times. but I didn't really want to talk to him just wanted to sit there. Then Mouse as I call him yelled at me and I went and started talking to him cuz I hadn't seen him in 4 months and well his phone was canceled. Throught the next hour he told me that he though I seemed older( intoxication) and that he had cancer, then we both had a shot of Jager and he got another beer and me a shot of butterscotch snapps. some guy gave me a spank with that paddle and complained that I didn't flinch...he missed and i didn't feel it! Anyway I ended walking to Mouse's house and well both feel down a wet grassy hill laughing all the way down. We got to his place and I slept over there...couldn't drive! Sunday was okay...went to b-fast with mom and Kona, played cards all day and had Easter dinner together. Today I don't know I was fine till about lunch...I guess things with Mouse's cancer were starting to take me over...Maddy asked me something and I was an ass and said I was worried about a mutal friend who had cancer and then she looked at me funny so I told her...she isn't doing great so I in essence dragged down...damn me for being a self=centered aries prick! Honestly I had a crush on Mouse and well he told me he didn't want to date...he asked me out at the bar, I am so confused cuz I kinda like Dave but I am getting the hollow feeling I get when things go south in a relationship and well..I don't need to finish. But it seems the last 2.5-3 years since my Aunt died on my b-day/easter the more I care for people they get sick and either die or commit suscide. I am beggining to wonder what I am here for if that is all I have to live for is to see people die, then the hell with it! I am scared to get close to people for two reasons...as stupid as they are: 1. They gonna cheat on me 2. I care greatly for them and they get cancer and die. Well where do I go from here? It would be easier just not to feel, but that is just something I keeping failing at...among other things. well I think I am going to go sink a little deeper without taking you all with me...

?? Which Natural Wonder Or Disaster Are You ??
brought to you by Quizilla Goody I get a color label...BLUE!!! one fav out of two go me!
BLUES are motivated by INTIMACY, seek opportunities
to genuinely connect with others, and need to
be appreciated. They do everything with
quality and are devoted and loyal friends and
employers/employees. Whatever or whomever
they commit to are their sole (and soul)
focus. They love to serve and will give
freely of themselves in order to nurture
others lives. BLUES, however, do need to be understood. They have
distinct preferences and occasionally the
somewhat controlling (but always fair)
personality of a confident leader. Their code
of ethics is remarkably strong and they
expect others to live honest, committed lives
as well. They enjoy sharing meaningful
moments in conversation as well as
remembering special life events (i.e.,
birthdays and anniversaries). BLUES are
dependable, thoughtful, nurturing, and can
also be self-righteous, a bit worry-prone,
and emotionally intense. They are like
sainted pit-bulls who never let go of
something once they are committed. When you
deal with a BLUE, be sincere, make an effort
to truly understand them, and truly
appreciate them.

Remembrance

     I can still remember our first day. Running to my next class in the rain, I had gotten into another theoretical conversation with Professor Feezweld. I see your figure there half in the shadows always finishing off a cigarette. 

"Late again Huh? Waiting to have  me walk you into class?" 

"N-no! I got stuck with my last Professor." I can feel my heart racing. My hands feel so weak along with my knees.

"Hmmm, Okay whatever you say." Laughter colors you rich baritone voice...My heart Melts again.

I mutter thanx shyly, for some reason my throat tightens, like the collar my mother made me wear when I got into trouble. Out of the shdows that you were staying hidden in, Your tall form slides gracefully out of tem makeing no noise except the sizzle of you cigarette as it hits the wet ground turning into a littered peice of trash. I think of all the trash I have picked up this morning. I bend to pick it up, I feel as though I am being watched... being touched or rather...stripped of my clothing! Nervously I snatch up the spent cigartte, while wondering who is paying such close attention to me, I swear we are the only ones here. Rigidly I stand normal, for a second, a flash rather, I swear I see you smile. A tear falls gently from my eyes, and trickles slowly over my puffy swollen cheaks, finally dripping off my shin onto the polished wood. I smile in my pain and think..."And that is what started everything."

"Hey...don't blame yourself for it!" says another familar voice, falsey comforting a broken heart.

"MMM, I am not. Just remembering the day we met for the first time." I say trying to choak back the tears.

"Awww Honey, come here, dry those tears. Remember he only wished for your happiness, that is why it happened and don't feel bitter...I don't...Hmmm funny I am his mother and I am not bitter. I figured he would die to either help someone or by falling down the stairs in old age! Now look at me. Tell me before I go that you don't still blame yourself!"

"I don't, I just miss him so much.." I say weakly

"We all do honey, Take care and call when you get home, I want to know that you are safe."

"I will, Talk to you later tonight" I try to sound normal, but it still comes out so soft and weak.

"Okay honey"

I stand there staring at the slack pale face of my boyfriend. Flashing in my mind is his expression he had when he died in my arms out in the alley of our favorite dance club. We had just left, walking close like we always did. Then all of a sudden a yeall that we both looked to see the source, he wraps himself around me with his body with his back to the evil man who already was raiseing the gun, taking aim and pulling the trigger.BANG!BANG!BANG! Rings out. And running footsteps, he looks into my eyes, kisses me and says " I love you, always smile and remem.." that was the last thiing he spoke. His body started to slip and I clutched it to let him down slowly, hopeing against a hope that my worst fear wouldn't be true. Now laying in my arms on the ground I look over his body in a panic and I see two holes in his chest with blood gurgleing out. With one hand I grab my cell phone and call 9-1-1 with the other I try to taunch the bleeding in his chest.

"9-1-1 What is your Emergency?" Says a woman in a chessy voice. GAH!

"M-My Boyfriend just got shot!"

"Okay Stay calm, how many times? Pulse? Breath? Stay calm it will be alright! What is your location...nevermind cell phone! I am dispaching an ambulance now!" The women's voice is just a buzz but I try to answer her torrent of questions.

"Ummmmm three...I think...slight pluse...OMG he isn't breathing!"

I see the pool of his blood expanding out all around the wounds and onto me. Slowly time goes by and they still aren't here, the blood goes even slower and then no longer seem to a have a flow at all. I just sit and stare at his beautiful face, the bright sky blue eyes now a dull slate gray. The black hair just long enought to run my hands through freely matted and sticky, his red lips are now a unnatural pink fleshy color, his creased forehead now is smooth, taking away part of his character. I cry in disbelif because your gone, I know this but I still hold you close and hope the EMT's can save your life. We know the rest...you died, 1:13 AM October 30th, 2005.

"I know you will be close to me, for the rest of my life. I promise to keep smiling and I'll remember the happy times we had together. I smile the most when we meet up again." I whisper. I slowly turn and walk toward my car. I stop ar the last hill and look into the November setting sun and tell myself that my sorrow will end when the sun no longer lights the sky tonight. Still I will always love and remember you. With that I cry and drive, not sure where I am going, just driving like we had done so many times before as the sun set  on the Western horizon.

By: Ian Mucci

Well life really honestly sucks. I don't really think I am cut out for the U anymore nor to be around anyone. I feel really useless, alone, frustrated, depressed, and worthless. I have been flirting with the idea of suscide for the last couple of weeks. No matter what I do people seem to only be unhappy around me and I just feel that I am a waste of energy in their lives, the one thing I care most about is that my frineds are happy but I seem to only bring them pain and unhappiness so what is the reason I should even be around anymore? I have no hope anymore I don't think that I can ever be the way I want nor a useful person in anybodies life, If i am to be cursed with being alone then the hell with this thing that is called life! The party at Kari's was interesting...I poured hot wax on myself and it felt weird, Moses licked cholate frosting off me ( unerving), I faked a orgasm-well what a guy can do anyway, and drank a little. At the end I felt out of place and that I shouldn't be there much less around anymore. I am even to the point that I am faithless for myself and all that I hold dear. I just feel like I am wrapped in the darkness and I know that there is truly no one who really honestly cares if I fade away, all will say otherwise but I am so sick of the ulterior motives. I just don't want to be here anymore and yet I still can't say good-bye, I wish I knew kept me here so that I could just elminate it then I can just disappear and everyone will just go on, happy and safe.

brought to you by Quizilla Well I had a interesting weekend...So lets start with Friday, It was boring until I got back to the UC for the POWERS party which was fun and very interesting with all the costumes...rainbow bright, vampire sluts and pirates, hags, homo-fairies, weblings, will smith etc. That was fun I was even wiliing to give a tarot reading for the costume contest...I lost to Nickola by one vote on the sexiset, meh I never stood a chance. Okay left from POWERS and went home and to bed...oh and Alice drew on the webbing at the time during the party, I was 90% naked in the Lambda office...creeps! Okay so Saturday I was a dork. I told Ryan I would help set up the dance at 2-3ish and so I got there and we didn't get much done...Then I rushed off to a meeting that I needed to go to which was fun but I was late and diddn't meet some people that I was supposed too. Work kinda sucked but I wrote a angroganous story I just have to finish it. So lets fast foward a bit... I went and parked the car then went to Amvets to meet up with Kari and a few other people, I was going to go down but ehh nope they wouldn't let me event though 18-20 can be in a bar till 10pm leagaly, oh well small loss there. I walked to the Lambda dance and got asked by alot of people what I was doing with the giant spider! fun fun and some girls asked me wheather the webs went down further and I showed them some. ANyway got to the dance and changed out to just pants and danced for a bit and there was this cutie just standing theier so I grabbed someone and said lets make him come out and dance...Decker he be and wowie! yeah I ended up spending most of the night either holdiing his hand, hugging him, kissing him, or just being close. They let me take my pants off at midnight and I think josh almost had a coronary! I think that alot of people just about had a coronary when I walded into the green room... I think that some were quiet pissed. oh well I got Miss Jade's approval at that is AWESOME! I think genusis is pissed that I was hangaing out with Decker so much since they live in the same complex. Anyway I had red prints on my ass later, cuz of all the slapping. So me and Decker left the dance a bit early and went to his apartment and watched a movie...yes people really actually watched a movie. After we started kissing and we went to bed and only cuddled and kissed, it was nice to be with someone and not be expected to have sex. We got up and showed toghether and then he dropped me off at my car and we swapped #'s and then he went to work I went home. Sunday.. was boring went to Lolo and worked for frank. Came home and started dinner for mom and kona and I . I felt like a third wheel and got a bit depressed when they kissed and I saw them toghether.. more so I got lonely felt like I was in the house all alone without anything or motivation whatsoever. I am torn because I can't understand why I let myself get this way I am still a bit depressed over the situation. I feel dirty and horrible because some people told me at the dance that I looked disgusting I think was the term, I feel really bad... People were horified to see another part of me... the bold sexual me apparently that is not acceptable... not even to some of my colsest friends. hmmmm I don't know what to do I just feel down and it is my fav. holiday but I just can't seem to get into the spirit of things.. I think I might write a poem not sure though...I feel small and insignifagant, yeah I feel stupid in thinking that i wouldn't bother people with my costume...meh I don't have to let anyone guess what is under the clothing anymore..well except for the privates but... still hmm I guess I'll just shut up and hope I can cope with it.

Okay so I over did it again and I am sick...cold I think. A couple of days ago a guy e-mailed me and asked if I was in porn...wow never thought that would happen. I have been swinging in and out of depression since Steven dumped me and I don't know why. And honestly by the way I am tired of this emotional rollercoaster...even with all of the lovely events ie. local beatings and such I am really stressed and I am over doing my body into fits of revolt. I am looking forward to the dance but I am not sure I should go due to the fact that 2 out of 3 ex's will be there more worried about the recent then the latter(yes tyler this is you) one. I hope he doesn't do any thing stupid(steven) and gets himself abused or anything...why do I care about my last abuser? I don't get it I am just loseing it I guess. Today we had the meeting of Colatlion against hate. and I opened my big mouth and wham! like a punch to the gut not only am I nervous cuz my prof. from Abnormal Psyc. was there but I put myself on display as a puching bag for not reporting the incidents yet...I think that I should bow out of the coalition cuz I know that I am getting ignored because of the report thing and since I got growled at about the LACK of SECURITY at the next Lambda dance, when I mentioned that one or two cops will do no good I think that the board is pissed at me for that. Oh well I guess I will never fit in there either, I guess I should just nnot be as openly concered for the community I am in . I just don't know I hurts me to think that I am not even accepted fully in the community that I belong in. Well I am beging to think FUCK YOU TOO!

It hurts me to think that not even my own Goddess....Friends don't think that I can comit to a relationship and that they so brazenly assume that since I broke up with Tyler after 3 weeks, and Steven did dump me people I didn't dump him ALSO Rae dumped me too after a month(rae only), so how am I the bad guy huh? Shit why do you people perpetuate my feelings of uslessness and unworthyness to be here, by saying things like that? Will you explain that to me?!That is if you can.

Anyway hopefully life will become better.

I looked up the effects and it is just the withdrawl from that peticular drug so hopefully tomarrow will be normal...LOL whatever that may be. Well he called me yesterday and we meet up at alberson's before he had to go run some errands and go meet with some friends he had plans with. I was nice to meet him and as it turns out I have been wanting to talk to himm but just plainly doubted my gaydar and well I have chicked out talking to him, so that was a nice twist to the day. This places you in the Lover Style of: The Surprising Lover. 

The Surprising Lover is a wonderful Lover Style, and, like the name implies, is often filled with hidden delights and talents that might not be apparent from a surface knowledge of the person. The Surprising Lover is rather like a geode--sometimes rough on the exterior, but filled with beauty and wonder. The Surprising Lover is thus a gem to find, though it can sometimes be difficult to do so because they often tend to be humble and unwilling to reveal their inner greatness unless they're in a rewarding relationship. 

In terms of physical love, the Surprising Lover really shines, often highly imaginative and utterly devoted to bringing the heights of pleasure to the one that they truly love. Given a rewarding, reciprocative relationship, and the right lover, the Surprising Lover can be a delight in bed. 

Best Compatibility can probably be found with: The Carnal Lover (most of all) or the Exotic Lover, or the Suave Lover.
